com.versant.xa
Class VXAResource

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.xa.VXAResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.transaction.xa.XAResource
public class VXAResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.transaction.xa.XAResource

Class VXAResource implements the standard javax.transaction.xa.XAResource interface.

This classes adapts VERSANT for use with TMs through the standard XA apis. Session pooling is done within this class and this class will take care of acquiring and releasing VERSANT connections on an as needed basis.

Constructor Detail

VXAResource

public VXAResource(SessionPool pool)
VXAResource constructor.

This form of the VXAResource constructor allows the user to pass in a custom built session pool.

The xa_open method is called within this method.

VXAResource

public VXAResource(java.lang.String dbName)
VXAResource constructor.

Parameters:
dbName - is the name of the database to connect to.

This form of the VXAResource constructor allows the user to construct a VXAResource without the user having to pass a custom built SessionPool instance.

The SessionPool used by an instance of this VXAResource creates only TransSessions. The minimum number of Sessions is 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE is the maximum number of Sessions.

The xa_open method is called within this method.

getTransactionTimeout

public int getTransactionTimeout()
                          throws javax.transaction.xa.XAException
The getTransactionTimeout will currently return 0. There is no support for setting the transaction timeout currently.

public boolean setTransactionTimeout(int seconds)
